name: Bulge '44
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Bulge '44, an operational level World War II simulation. Bulge '44 covers the classic German final offensives, Operations Wacht am Rhein ("Watch on the Rhein") and Herbstnebel ("Autumn Fog") in the West in the attempt to drive a wedge between the Allied Armies and push on to Antwerp.
